html:div.html:p: This provides a list of changes to the MyIG specification since its initial release
html:div.p: 2023-12-22 v1.2.0 - Allergy (Patient Dossier) based on FHIR 4.0.1
html:div.html:p: 2023-02-10 v1.1.0 - Allergy R1 (STU1) based on FHIR R4
2022-09-16 v1.0.1 - Allergy R1 (STU1) based on FHIR R4
2022-05-31 v1.0.0 - Allergy R1 (STU1) based on FHIR R4

html:ul.html:li: Initial version Release notes on GitHub
